name: Kennen

sources.import_notes: Generated baseline canonical champion file from From Online dataset.

notes: Ability effects are intentionally minimal placeholders until scripted modeling is added.

passive.name: Mark of the Storm
passive.description: Innate:  Kennen's  abilities apply a  stack of Mark of the Storm to enemies hit.
passive.description_source:
Kennen will still restore energy if the target dies from the third stack of Mark of the Storm.
After  Slicing Maelstrom applies its third stack, the target gains a 6-second stack immunity against Slicing Maelstrom that refreshes on subsequent hits.

basic_ability_1.name: Thundering Shuriken
basic_ability_1.description: Active:  Kennen throws a shuriken in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit.
basic_ability_1.description_source: This ability will cast from wherever the caster is at the start of the cast time.

basic_ability_2.name: Electrical Surge
basic_ability_2.description: Passive:  Kennen's basic attacks  on-attack generate a stack of Electrical Surge, which stacks up to a cap. At max stacks, his next basic attack consumes them all to deal bonus magic damage and apply a stack of  Mark of the Storm.
basic_ability_2.description_source:
The empowered basic attack applies bonus  spell damage, while the electrical surge deals  area damage.
Electrical Surge's enhanced attack will be consumed and the bonus damage will not be applied if Kennen is  blinded.
Electrical Surge's enhanced attack cannot be  dodged or  blocked.
The empowered attack will trigger but not be consumed nor apply its effects against  structures and  wards.

basic_ability_3.name: Lightning Rush
basic_ability_3.description: Active:  Kennen becomes lightning, a  ghosted form that gains  bonus movement speed for a short time. He deals magic damage to enemies he passes through and restores  energy if he damaged an enemy at all. Lightning Rush can be recast within the duration and automatically recasts afterwards.
basic_ability_3.description_source:
Lightning Rush will only damage any particular enemy once per cast.
For the purpose of aim-assist, Kennen's  attack range is reduced[ by 575 ][ to -25 ]during Lightning Rush, further reduced to -33.75 with  Rapid Firecannon.

ultimate.name: Slicing Maelstrom
ultimate.description: Active:  Kennen summons a storm that strikes at nearby enemy champions, dealing magic damage. Enemies take increased damage from each subsequent strike.
ultimate.description_source: Active:  Kennen summons a storm that strikes at nearby enemy champions, dealing magic damage. Enemies take increased damage from each subsequent strike.
